reviewText: This sultry and erotic tale was very inspirational. The entire animation was both unique and colorful. The story-line drew me immediately as I could tell that this was carefully made and a lot of hard-work was put into this. It was very artistic and I just love the way it was put together. The story is wonderful as it is told from the perspective of the main protagonist of the story. The music, the effects, the animation was all very nice and yet had a sense of ethereal to them. The contoured and infrared-like lighting was also very lovely. This is a definite must watch! :)

I'm really surprised by this Independent Animation. I loved it. Finally! There is a film written to address the true dark, foreboding, and seductive nature of Ancient Greek stories. I really wished Hollywood would take a note.
